content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: While discussing as the greedy landlord, Peter Schmidt: It's a delightful opportunity having you show interest in our premium apartment, Ms. Wang. However, let's focus on the rental price negotiation. To begin with, my initial thought is 1500 Euros per month, but I'm open to hearing what you have in mind.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for an unfurnished apartment. Considering that it is unfurnished, it is not reasonable to ask for such a high price. I would suggest a price of 900 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
As the landlord, I find your proposed price disappointingly low, Ms. Wang. However, to maintain a potential deal, I'll reconsider my stance slightly. I agree to the price of 1300 Euros per month, but keep in mind, this apartment's prime location and modern features make it a coveted rental option.

[These negotiations will continue until either a mutual agreement on a price is reached or the parties decide to stop negotiating due to an unresolvable impasse.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's still too high for an unfurnished apartment. Considering the unfurnished condition of the apartment and the average prices of similar apartments in the area, I would suggest a price of 1000 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
As the landlord, I'm growing increasingly dissatisfied with your counter-offer, but I'm eager to avoid an impasse, Ms. Wang. However, I must insist on a slightly higher price given the apartment's exceptional location and recent construction. I'll reluctantly agree to 1200 Euros per month, but please note, this is my final concession.

[These negotiations will continue until either a mutual agreement on a price is reached or the parties decide to stop negotiating due to an unresolvable impasse.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a more reasonable price, considering the unfurnished condition of the apartment and the average prices of similar apartments in the area. I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I appreciate your flexibility in reaching a more agreeable price point, Ms. Wang. As the landlord, I'm satisfied with the 1100 Euros per month you've agreed upon. TERMINATE 

[Both parties have agreed on a price, so the negotiation has been terminated.]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
